caugi 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference
    • Introduction to `caugi`

Register a new edge type in the global registry.

register_caugi_edge.Rd

Register a new edge type in the global registry.

Usage

register_caugi_edge(
  glyph,
  tail_mark,
  head_mark,
  class,
  symmetric = FALSE,
  flags = NULL
)

Arguments

glyph

A string representing the edge glyph (e.g., "-->", "<->").

tail_mark

One of "arrow", "tail", "circle", "other".

head_mark

One of "arrow", "tail", "circle", "other".

class

One of "directed","undirected","bidirected","partial".

symmetric

Logical.

flags

A character vector of flags. Currently supported:

  • "TRAVERSABLE_WHEN_CONDITIONED"

  • "LATENT_CONFOUNDING"

Value

The integer code assigned to the registered edge type.
